Extendable Dining Tables for 14 or More

Its never been easier to make room around the dinner table. Our 14 person dining table collection features a variety of table styles with gorgeous finishes. Whether your personal style leans more modern or traditional, you can only expect the finest Amish-made quality when you purchase a dining table from us.

About Our Extendable Dining Tables

The tables you see here seat anywhere from 5 people to 8 people, with extensions that can seat an additional 12 people, allowing you to seat up to 14 people or more. We carry virtually every style and shape of table imaginable, from mission tables to quaint country tables and more. Youll see a wide range of designs, including standard leg tables, trestle tables, and pedestal tables, as well as tables with storage.

Why Amish Tables?

For families big and small, you cant go wrong with a dining table from Amish Tables. Here are some things that make us stand out from the rest.
  • Personalized to your liking. Our tables can be customized to your exact vision. First, select your wood type and stain. Then, drill down to the fine details such as edge style and specialty techniques like distressing and burnishing. You can also choose the size of your extension to meet your seating needs with these extendable tables, you can seat 14 or more people!
  • Amish quality, shipped nationwide and internationally. Our tables are handcrafted by Amish craftsmen in the USA. Rest assured that when you buy a table from us, youll enjoy superior quality that stands the test of time.
  • Try a sample. If youre unsure of which finish to go with for your table, order yourself a sample. You can even order a custom stain sample starting at $5.
